constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 208 (Thursday, December 2, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. NORMAN:
H.R. 6133.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H6910]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To require the Commissioner of Food and Drugs to make available for public inspection all records of information submitted to the Food and Drug Administration in conjunction with authorizing the emergency use of, or licensing, a COVID-19 vaccine.
